metadata.Title: CVE-2015-3223

Platform: SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for Raspberry Pi 12 SP2
SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for SAP Applications 12
SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for SAP Applications 12 SP1

metadata.Description: The ldb_wildcard_compare function in ldb_match.c in ldb before 1.1.24, as used in the AD LDAP server in Samba 4.x before 4.1.22, 4.2.x before 4.2.7, and 4.3.x before 4.3.3, mishandles certain zero values, which allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (infinite loop) via crafted packets.

criterions.comment: SUSE Linux Enterprise Server 12 SP2 is installed
SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for Raspberry Pi 12 SP2 is installed
